snippet: Wade sustained a knee injury in the first half, and the Miami Heat’s playoff chances took another blow with a 114-88 road loss to Cleveland.
abstract: Miami Heat shooting guard Dwyane Wade is injured in 114-88 loss to Cleveland Cavaliers.
lead_paragraph: Wade sustained a knee injury in the first half, and the Miami Heat’s playoff chances took another blow with a 114-88 road loss to Cleveland.

headline.main: Dwyane Wade Injured as Heat Lose
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Pro Basketball; Wade Is Injured in Heat’s Loss
